extendedInfo.description: Activity book is an interactive education game/e-book hybrid for children aged 3 to 7. This game teach your children how to do various activity from waking up until arrived at school, with educative information, attractive graphics ,cheerful music and fun game mechanics in each activity.Features :- Familiar book-ish interface mixed with fun mini games.- Each activity presented in an interactive,appealing and fun way.- Colorful and attractive graphics, your children will never be bored.- Interactive and fun media for children to learn, no more boring text book.- Cheerful Music.- Simple yet fun game mechanics.- Personalized game play via profile system. Giving deeper experience when playing this game.- Support up to 8 player profiles.- First edition bonus book : Teach your children about activity from waking up until arrived at school.

reviews.title: very interactive app
reviews.comment: this amazing for kids and they wiil be never bored with this! thanks for making this app
reviews.author: A Google User
